ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is for the like of this that all workers should work!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For this the toilers should strive."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: For the like of it should the workers work.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: for which one must strive hard.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: For such a reward should the workers perform.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: For the like of this let the workers work.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: For the like of this then let the workers work.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: for the like of this let the workers work.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: For the like of this, then, let the workers work.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is for the like of this that all should strive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: For the like of this, then, let the workers work.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Let all workers work for the like of this!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For the like of this let all strive, who wish to strive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: For the like of this let the workers work.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and for the like of this let the workers work.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: For the like of this let the workers work.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: For the like of this let the workers [on earth] work.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:61] For the like of this let [all] the workers work — it is said that this is said to them, or it is what they say [themselves].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then Allah will say to him: (For the like of this, then) eternity in Paradise and its bliss, (let the workers work) let those who hasten to do righteous works hasten to do them; it is also said that this means: for the like of this let those who compete to spend in the way of Allah spend their wealth; and it is also said that this means: for the like of this let those who strive in seeking knowledge and worship strive.
